Container.Name: silverbullet
Container.Overview: SilverBullet is a note-taking application optimized for people with a [hacker mindset](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hacker). We all take notes. There’s a million note taking applications out there. [Literally](https://www.noteapps.ca/). Wouldn’t it be nice to have one where your notes are _more_ than plain text files? Where your notes essentially become a _database_ that you can query; that you can build custom knowledge applications on top of?
